message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to introduce you to this excellent product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints. However, $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $12,500. This offer represents a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $12,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $11,250. I think this is a fair price for both of us.
Bob, you're clearly serious about this product and I want to make a deal. How about we split the difference - $11,875.  That's my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,500, but no higher. This is my final offer.
